name: Hitmontop
flavorText:
If you become
enchanted by its
smooth, elegant, dance-like kicks,
you may get
drilled hard.

previous.name: Tyrogue
previous.flavorText:
It is always
bursting with en­
ergy. To make it­ self stronger, it
keeps on fighting
even if it loses.

next.name: Smoochum
next.flavorText:
Its lips are the
most sensitive
parts on its body. It always uses its
lips first to
examine things.

pokemon.name: Tyrogue
pokemon.flavorText:
It is always
bursting with en­
ergy. To make it­ self stronger, it
keeps on fighting
even if it loses.

pokemon.name: Hitmonlee
pokemon.flavorText:
When in a hurry,
its legs lengthen
progressively. It runs smoothly
with extra long,
loping strides.

pokemon.name: Hitmonchan
pokemon.flavorText:
While apparently
doing nothing, it
fires punches in lightning fast
volleys that are
impossible to see.
